rows.label: bf11260100_0010
rows.name:
Yes. Many troops remained here, with no orders,
after Metsu sank their homeland.

rows.label: bf11260100_0020
rows.name:
We're doing our best to disarm them, but...
Well, you've seen the village.

rows.label: bf11260100_0030
rows.name: Sadly, it's happened more than once.

rows.label: bf11260100_0040
rows.name:
The powers-that-be bicker among themselves,
ignoring the larger danger.

rows.label: bf11260100_0050
rows.name:
And right now that is the one thing
we cannot afford.

rows.label: bf11260100_0060
rows.name: I will go take a look.

rows.label: bf11260100_0070
rows.name: Incidentally how has Iira been faring?

rows.label: bf11260100_0080
rows.name:
I'd like to tell you that the people bask
in the peace of His Majesty's rule.

rows.label: bf11260100_0090
rows.name: ...But I'm afraid that would be a lie.

rows.label: bf11260100_0100
rows.name: Same as everywhere else, then... Yes?

rows.label: bf11260100_0110
rows.name: Ira has not escaped Metsu's rampage unscathed.

rows.label: bf11260100_0120
rows.name:
If that is so, allow me to offer you
the Imperial Army's assistance in this time of...

rows.label: bf11260100_0140
rows.name:
This is the reason why Acedia
entrusted her to me...
